cancelSession.question: Do you really want to cancel the session {{label}}?
cancelSession.explanation: Give a reason for cancelling the session:
cancelSession.maxLengthValidationError: Reason can be max {{ max }} characters long!

activateSession.title: Activate cancelled session
activateSession.question: Do you really want to activate the cancelled session {{label}}?

form.reasonPlaceholder: Reason why no tutorial group is  happening on that day
form.maxLengthValidationError: Reason can be max {{ max }} characters long!

deleteButton.question: Are you sure that you want to delete the Tutorial Group Free Day on {{ title }}?
deleteButton.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the date of the tutorial group free day to confirm.

createConfiguration.title: Create Tutorial Groups Configuration
createConfiguration.explanation: Before you can start creating tutorial groups, you must specify some properties that concern all tutorial groups. This can also be changed later.

timeZoneInput.label: Timezone
timeZoneInput.changeWarning: You have changed the timezone. All tutorial groups session will be deleted as a consequence. Are you sure you want to do this?
timeZoneInput.explanation: The time zone in which the tutorial groups occur. This will be used to interpret the start and end times of the tutorial groups. You can search for a time zone by typing into the field.
timeZoneInput.requiredValidationError: You need to select a time zone!

periodInput.label: Tutorial Group Period
periodInput.explanation: The period in which the tutorial groups occur in the semester. This will be used to create the individual sessions.
periodInput.requiredValidationError: You need to select a period!
periodInput.parseError: Period must be in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD - YYYY-MM-DD'
periodInput.invalidRange: Period must be a valid date range

manageTutorialGroups.title: Tutorial Groups Management
manageTutorialGroups.tableCaption: Tutorial Groups defined for this course

schedule.periodWarning: Note: The period you selected differs from the period of the tutorial group configuration!

deleteButton.question: Are you sure to delete the Tutorial Group with title {{ title }}?
deleteButton.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the title of the tutorial group to confirm.

manageSchedule.title: Schedule
manageSchedule.schedule: Every {{ weekDay }} from {{ startTime }} to {{ endTime }}

sessionForm.requiredDateWarning: You need to select a date!
sessionForm.dateParseError: Date must be in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'

titleInput.label: Title
titleInput.maxLengthValidationError: Title can be max {{ max }} characters long!

teachingAssistantInput.label: Teaching Assistant
teachingAssistantInput.placeholder: Select a teaching assistant that will be responsible for this group.
teachingAssistantInput.notFoundText: No teaching assistants found in this course.
teachingAssistantInput.requiredValidationError: A tutorial groups needs a teaching assistant assigned!
teachingAssistantInput.taHelp: You can search for a teaching assistant by typing into the field.

additionalInformationInput.label: Additional Information
additionalInformationInput.placeholder: Additional information about the tutorial group.
additionalInformationInput.maxLengthValidationError: Additional information is limited to {{ max }} characters!

locationInput.placeholderOnline: How can the students join the online meeting?
locationInput.placeholderOffline: How can the students find the room?
locationInput.maxLengthValidationError: Location is limited to {{ max }} characters!

isOnlineInput.label: Does this tutorial group meet online? (Online-Tutorial)

scheduleForm.scheduleChangeWarning: You changed the schedule. All sessions belonging to the old schedule will be deleted as a consequence. Are you sure you want to do this?
